levels.description: We all had to start somewhere... Ash had to start in Pallet Town and had to beat Brock for his first badge. Let's see if you're as good to collect 'em all!
levels.title: Newcomer

levels.description: Not bad... but you still have a long way to go! You have merely proven that you get thirsty once in a while... Try and collect these:
levels.title: Rookie

levels.description: Well done, you have proven that you do have some dedication in your life... even though its clearly in the wrong activity. But hey, you have come so far, you might as well go through it till the end!
levels.title: Amateur

levels.description: Now that you have come so far, we made a level espacially for you, Rick Sanchez! Only you can reach this far!
levels.title: Rick Sanchez
